title: 29-Years-Old Bachelor Was… Brought to a Different World to Live Freely - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Psychological   Romance   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Age Regression   Beastkin   Calm Protagonist   Cheats   Demi-Humans   Depictions of Cruelty   Dwarfs   Early Romance   Elemental Magic   Elves   European Ambience   Fantasy World   First-time Interc**rse   Game Elements   Gods   Level System   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Monster Girls   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Politics   Polygamy   R-15   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   Reverse R*pe   Royalty   R*pe   Sadistic Characters   S*aves   Sword And Magic   Threesome   Transported to Another World
author: Ryuto   リュート
description:
29-year old Taichi Mitsuba lives a lonely life as a salaryman with his only comfort being video games. He dreams of becoming the hero of an RPG-like fantasy world. Going to bed after another boring day, he gets his wish fulfilled and is summoned to the world of Eliard by a god.

Bestowed with powerful abilities, he decides to live a free life. But on the first day he gets entangled with a girl who wants to marry him and from that point he keeps picking up more girls and running into more troubles.

‘I will continue to live without losing to these difficulties.’>
